title: Assembly remapping warnings on net461 with nestandard 2.0 packages and publish profile
body:
VS2017 15.5, MSBuild 15

### Steps to reproduce

Create new 4.6.1 WebJob project
Install NetStandard 2.0 package (like EEFCore 2.0)
Build project: no warnings

Publish WebJob: publish profile created
Build project: the following warnings appear

```
  Consider app.config remapping of assembly "System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" from Version "4.0.10.0" [C:\Program Files (x86)\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\.NETFramework\v4.6.1\Facades\System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.dll] to Version "4.1.3.0" [C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Professional\MSBuild\Microsoft\Microsoft.NET.Build.Extensions\net461\lib\System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.dll] to solve conflict and get rid of warning.
1>  Consider app.config remapping of assembly "System.Data.Common, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a" from Version "0.0.0.0" [] to Version "4.2.0.0" [C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Professional\MSBuild\Microsoft\Microsoft.NET.Build.Extensions\net461\lib\System.Data.Common.dll] to solve conflict and get rid of warning.
```
